entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Finish CI Automation for WinUI Device Tests #14696
    .NET 8
  • WKUIDelegate.RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel bad implementation #14695
  • Unconstrained * rows/columns in Grid may expand when they should not #14694
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.DataTransfer.ShareMultipleFilesRequest to include Text property #14693
  • [Android] Page appears to receive focus #14692
  • Synchronous prompt on CustomScriptDialogOpening WebView2 #14691
  • Windows application crashes on static resource not found while it works on Android #14690
  • TabbedPage: WinUI: Back-button persists when swapping to a Tab that does not have a NavigationPage. #14689
  • When FlyoutItem is used instead of ShellContent, the menu item text is invisible #14688
  • [Android] ContentView measures content even if its IsVisible is set to False #14683
  • To can check if location is enabled #14682
  • Shell back navigation not working #14681

Closed

  • Border Margin #7764
    Backlog
  • FillRule.EvenOdd not working for shapes #14461
    Backlog
  • [Android|Windows] Only can render one CollectionView #3464
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor default application won't build if wasm-tools is not installed #5097
    Backlog
  • RichTextKit/SkiaSharp on Android: Could not resolve type with token 0100000b from typeref (expected class 'System.ReadOnlySpan`1' in assembly 'mscorlib') #5142
    Backlog
  • Removing the NavBar causes a white field to appear in its place #11611
    Backlog
  • Cannot navigate to page when Shell menu item has IsVisible=False #14470
    Backlog
  • Basic Binding Label is not working #14657
  • [WinUI] Replacing CollectionView ItemSource does not clear underlying children from VisualTree #14507
    Backlog
  • Style values are being applied too early #14678
  • Appsettings.json System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14679
  • Custom controls pushing 'buttons' out of view results in loss of event clicked processing #14423
  • Delete and Add a row messes up the sequencing in a custom grid control #14424
  • A plea for help #14677

PullRequests

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #14685
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Core] Fix Border margin issue #14402
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Add Xceed partners #14571
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
